name: Personalised childrens owl print
description:
This bespoke personalised childrens owl print would make a perfect gift for any child's nursery or bedroom.

This personalised name owl print for children would make a lovely gift to celebrate the birth of a baby. Alternatively it would be a charming birthday or christmas present for any child or friend!

Printed on beautiful off white matt recycled card which has a subtle fleck of brown and tan running through it and which gives the inks a lovely soft, muted almost watercolour like effect.

This unframed gicl√©e owl print comes from an original ClothKat hand drawn illustration which has then been digitally coloured.

Each personalised print will be signed and dated by ClothKat on the back.

This Scandinavian inspired owl print comes in a choice of four colours of owl - baby blue, soft pink, sunshiny yellow or moss green. Each colour of the personalised owl print comes with a complementary colour for the name text -

the blue owl - chocolate brown name text

the pink owl - soft browny-grey name text

the yellow owl - grey name text

the green owl - burnt orange name text

Please choose the colour of owl print from the drop down list.

It would look great in a woodland themed nursery, bedroom or playroom.

You can also choose to have a birth date added under the name as well as adding a special message of your own to make it truly unique e.g. With love from Grandma and Grandpa. When making a purchase, simply add the details in an email. 

This print is unframed.

The print is A4 in size and the owl and text image has been sized so that it will fit in many easily available off the shelf frames. 

Printed on recycled 250gsm matt card with inks that are guaranteed to last a life time (although as with any print it is advisable not to display it in direct sunlight as this can cause fading over time).

Your personalised childrens owl print will be wrapped in a protective cellophane sleeve, tissue paper and paper ribbon and will be sent to you in a flat stiff board backed envelope. Perfect if it is a gift for a new mum or dad.

UK mainland postage and packing for this item is free!

Printed onto A4 (29.7cm x 21cm) card. The image of the owl print (including the name text and birth date text) is approximately 19cm high.

Please note this print is unframed.

name: Elephant greetings card
description:
Super cute elephant greetings card in soft grey on an ice cream pink background.

From the ClothKat spring range of digitally printed cards this adorable elephant card is perfect for lots of occasions. Sure to be a favourite with both the young and young at heart.

This recycled greetings card would be a great way to wish someone a happy birthday or just to say thank you for being a friend.

This unique ClothKat design has a bit of a retro feel in the use of colours and style but is very contemporary in its stylishly simple design.

This card has been left blank so you can write your own message.

Due to the different types of computer screens, colours may vary slightly from examples shown.

The card is supplied with a white recycled paper envelope and is placed in a protective cellophane sleeve

This card will be posted out to you in a cardboard reinforced envelope by Royal Mail first class post to ensure it reaches you in mint condition.

Made from:
Designed and digitally printed in Scotland onto matt recycled card which has a lovely subtle fleck of tan and brown which complements the creamy colour of the card.

Dimensions:
The card is approximately 15cm x 15cm.

name: Sausage dog greetings card
description:
This dashing dachshund looks like he's full of mischief! Make someone's day with this delightful sausage dog greetings card.

Perfect for both children or adults as a birthday card or just for any occasion when you want to show someone you care!

This recycled greetings card would look charming framed.

This card will be sent to you by first class mail in a cellophane wrapper along with a recycled white paper envelope and mailed out to you in a reinforced envelope so that it will reach you in perfect condition.

The card has been left blank for you to write your own message.

Made from:
Designed and digitally printed in Scotland onto high quality subtly speckled recycled card. The card has a beautiful appearance and matt finish.

Dimensions:
The card measures just under 15cm X 15cm.

description:
This little house greetings card features a super cute house nestled in the woods with a tiny red bird perched on top of the roof.

name: Owl greetings card
description:
What a hoot! Bring a smile to a loved one's face with this super cute owl greeting card!

This digitally printed owl design recycled card would make a perfect birthday card for adults or children alike. Or great just for making someone's day!

An excellant choice for any friends or relatives who love owl designs.

The popular ClothKat owl card has been updated for the spring of 2013. This quirky yet stylish card retains it's elements of Scandinavian design but now incorporates a little bit of tribal pattern and comes in a range of ice cream and retro inspired colours.

This charming owl card would also look lovely framed and hung on the wall.

This owl card comes in a choice of 5 delightful colourways, choose from a deep pink owl on a pale pink background, deep blue on pale blue, Green on light green, purple on yellow or brown on orange.

Please specific which colour you would like from the drop down list above.

Left blank for you to write your own message.

Made from:
Digitally printed onto recycled off white matt card that has a lovely fleck of light tan and brown running through it. Comes in a cellophane wrapper with a white recycled envelope and is posted out to you in a reinforced envelope to ensure it arrives in pristine condition.

Dimensions:
The card measures approximately 15cm x 15cm.

name: House and heart greetings card
description:
Home is most definitely where the heart is with this delightful house and heart card!

Digitally printed onto beautifully textured and flecked recycled card, the popular ClothKat house and heart card has been updated for the spring of 2013.

Designed and printed in Scotland this card Incorporates Scandinavian inspired pattern and retro elements.

Great as a stylish change of address card.

Alternatively it would be an ideal way to celebrate a friend or relative's move to a new home.

This digitally printed recycled greeting card is available in the following colourways - purple house and heart on a yellow background, dark blue house and heart on pink, dark blue house and heart on light blue and dark green on light green background.

Made from:
This card comes with a white recycled paper envelope and is popped into a cellophane bag to ensure it reaches you in mint condition.

Dimensions:
The card measures approximately 15cm squared.

name: Heart lavender sachet
description:
Show that special someone that you care with one of these lovely organic cotton hand printed heart lavender sachets.

Inspired by Scandinavian design and folk art patterns this organic cotton heart lavender sachet would make a great present for your mum for mother's day.

Alternatively this would make a delightful gift for any friend or relative. Or just a treat for yourself - go on you deserve it!

A lovely way to add a touch of extra decoration to your bedroom, this sachet would look charming hanging from a wardrobe door or bed frame.

This charming heart shaped lavender bag is available in printed crimson on grey organic cotton, printed crimson on beige organic cotton or pale yellow on grey organic cotton.

The back of the heart sachet features an envelope opening inside of which is a removable organic muslin sachet that holds the lavender and polyester stuffing.

This means that if the scent of the lavender starts to fade the muslin inner can be removed and refreshed with a couple of drops of lavender essential oil before it is popped back inside the heart sachet. The back also features the ClothKat logo.

Please specify which colour of heart you would prefer from the drop down menu above.

As this item is made to order please allow up to three days prior to despatch.

Made from:
The fabric used is organic Fair trade cotton (either in grey or beige) and the sachet is lightly stuffed with polyester filling and dried lavender.

Hand screen printed using water based solvent free ink.

This product is non washable, spot wash only by hand.

Dimensions:
The heart is approximately 14 centimetres tall, not including the string.

First class UK postage and packing for this item is FREE!

options.name: Crimson on grey organic cotton fabric
Yellow on grey organic cotton fabric
Crimson on beige organic cotton fabric

name: Organic cotton stag cushion
description:
This iconic yet quirky stag cushion would be a welcome addition to any comfy chair or sofa.

This organic cotton cushion has been inspired by the classic image of a stag in silhouette. 

The pattern has been influenced by a combination of Fair Isle and Scandinavian design with a little bit of tribal pattern for good measure!

This stag cushion would make a lovely gift for any animal design loving friends or relatives.

Great for the living room, bedroom, kitchen, or study.

Alternatively you may just want to treat yourself ‚Äì go on you deserve it!

This hand screen printed cushion is available in a range of beautiful colours, pick from green, crimson or purple. 

These colours all complement the soft beige linen effect organic cotton fabric of the cushion cover.

The organic and fair trade cotton is sourced from a UK based company.

This cushion cover is individually handmade to order.

This cushion will make its way to you by first class recorded delivery - free of charge!

Screen printed by hand using water based, solvent free inks.

The cotton is organic and ethically produced.

Please spot wash by hand only. Iron on reverse.

Comes wrapped in high quality tissue paper and includes an information label. Please let me know if you would like a special message included.

The cushion is approximately 35cm by 35cm and has an envelope style opening at the back. This cushion comes with a polyester filled cushion inner.

name: Organic cotton fox cushion
description:
This playful organic cotton fox cushion cover is a super cute fellow!

This handmade fox cushion cover has a repeat pattern element to its design which has been inspired by Scandinavian and Fair Isle style and goes a little tribal in the tail!

Enhance a corner of your sofa or decorate a favourite chair with this fun and stylish cushion.

Great as a new home gift or a present for any design conscious friends.

Due to the nature of hand screen printing there may be slight variation in colour from that shown.

This fox cushion cover is available in orange, crimson or purple.

The fabric is in a neutral beige tone.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions at all about any aspects of this cushion.

First class recorded UK postage and packing for this item is free!

Hand screen printed with water based, solvent free inks on to organic cotton.

The cotton is fair trade, and is ethically produced.

Please do not machine wash this product. Spot wash by hand only. 

Iron on the reverse.

This cushion comes with a polyester filled cushion inner and measures approximately 35cm x 35cm.

The cushion has an envelope style back opening.

name: Organic Cotton Thistle Cushion
description:
This striking thistle cushion cover is handmade in Scotland.

This handmade organic cotton cushion has a repeat pattern element to its design which has been influenced by Scandinavian style with a bit of Fair Isle knitting pattern thrown in for good measure!

Enhance a corner of your sofa or decorate a favourite chair with this stylish yet simple cushion.

Great as a new home gift or a present for any design conscious friends.

The thistle cushion is now available in crimson or green as well as the original purple colour.

The fabric is in a warm natural beige tone.

Please do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions at all about any aspects of this cushion cover.

First class recorded UK postage and packing for this item is free!

Hand screen printed with water based, solvent free inks on to organic cotton.

Please do not machine wash this product. Spot wash by hand only. Iron on the reverse.

This cushion comes with a polyester filled cushion inner and measures approximately 35cm x 35cm.

The cushion has an envelope style back opening.

name: Owl Lavender Sachet
description:
What a hoot!

Bring a bit of nature and fun into your home with this adorable owl lavender sachet!

Inspired by Scandinavian design and folk art patterns this organic cotton lavender sachet would make a great present for a friend or relative who love owls or just love the stylish design. Or a treat for your mum on mother's day!

Wearing his pattern rather suavely, this owl is sure to add a charming touch to any space he is occupying whether it is hanging out in your wardrobe or from a bedroom door knob.

This delightful owl shaped bag comes in either crimson, light green, light blue or orange.

The back of the owl sachet has been updated for 2013 and now features an envelope opening inside of which is a removable organic muslin sachet that holds the lavender and polyester stuffing.

This means that if the scent of the lavender starts to fade the muslin inner can be removed and refreshed with a couple of drops of lavender essential oil before it is popped back inside the owl sachet. The back also features the ClothKat logo.
Please specify which colour of owl you would prefer from the drop down menu.

The fabric used is organic cotton and the sachet is lightly stuffed with polyester filling and dried lavender.

Hand screen printed using water based solvent free ink.

This product is non washable, spot wash only by hand.

The owl is approximately 13 centimetres tall, not including the string.

First class UK postage and packing for this item is FREE!

name: Organic Cotton Dragonfly Cushion
description:
This high quality hand screen printed dragonfly cushion would make an elegant addition to any chair, sofa or bed.

This handmade organic cotton cushion would make an ideal gift for a friend or relative who has just moved into a new home. Or lovely as a mother's day gift!

This cushion would look great in a living room, kitchen or conservatory.

As each cushion cover is made individually by hand they will vary slightly from the images shown here giving you a truly unique piece of work.

Comes wrapped in tissue paper and includes a care label and a gift tag. Please let me know if you would like a special message included.

This stunning dragonfly cushion is available in green or purple, both of which complement the neutral tones of the linen effect organic cotton fabric.

This dragonfly cushion cover will wing its way to you by first class recorded delivery ‚Äì free of charge!

Made using organic cotton fabric and printed with water based, solvent free inks.

Spot wash by hand only. Iron on reverse.

Measuring approximately 35cm by 35cm this cushion comes with a polyester filled cushion inner.

The cushion has an envelope style back opening.

name: Organic Cotton Owl Cushion
description:
Too wit too woo!

This delightful handmade owl cushion brings a cheerful yet soothing air to any space it occupies.

This organic cotton owl cushion design was in part inspired by traditional folk art fauna and also by Scandinavian simplicity.

This owl cushion cover would make a lovely gift for any owl design loving friends or family members.


Great as a new home present.

Alternatively you may just want to treat yourself ‚Äì go on you deserve it!

Hand screen printed cushion available in a light green, orange, crimson or dark blue colour on a soft linen effect neutral organic cotton fabric. 

Organic cotton sourced from a UK based company

This cushion will wing its way to you by first class recorded delivery - free of charge!

Screen printed by hand using water based, solvent free inks on to organic cotton.

Please spot wash by hand only. Iron on reverse.

The cushion is approximately 35cm by 35cm and comes with a polyester filled cushion inner and has an envelope style back opening.

name: Applique Beach Hut Shaped Lavender Sachet
description:
A beautiful appliqued lavender scented sachet in the shape of a beach hut featuring a heart design in stripy organic cotton/bamboo fabric.

Beach huts are such a British classic that I was inspired to make a lavender sachet in their honour! With its stripy heart in an organic fabric that evokes deck chairs and hot summer days you can bring a bit of the seaside to your home.

Great as a gift for someone special or as a lovely treat for yourself.

Comes wrapped in high quality tissue paper and includes an information label. Please let me know if you want any special message included.


This scented sachet is made of organic cotton and is backed in a striped organic cotton/bamboo fabric.

The lavender is contained in an inner removable muslin sachet. This means that if the scent begins to fade you can simply remove the muslin sachet and refresh with a couple of drops of lavender oil to continue enjoying the aroma.


The sachet measures approximately 13cm x 9.5cm (not including the loop for hanging).

name: Organic Sail Boat Cushion
description:
Ahoy there!

Bring a nautical touch to your home with this stylish sail boat cushion.

This organic cotton cushion cover has been screen printed by hand using water based inks.

Giving a playful yet serene air to any sofa, this stylish cushion would work well in a contemporary or more classic interior.

Once ordered this cushion will set sail to you by first class recorded delivery - free of charge!

Great for a living room, conservatory or study.

This cushion would make a lovely gift for a seafaring friend!

Being a natural product, slight imperfections and shade difference may occur but it also means that you get a truly unique item!

This cushion has a sail boat design picked out in a beautiful deep blue colour which works well on the neutral coloured background.

Made from 100 percent organic cotton.

The cushion cover has an envelope style back opening.

Iron on reverse and please spot wash by hand only.

This cushion is approximately 35cm by 35cm and comes with a polyester filled cushion inner.
